Thinking about health care policy, would you support or oppose expanding Medicare into a single, comprehensive public health insurance program that covers all Americans?

Thinking about health care policy, would you support or oppose allowing the U.S. government to negotiate prescription drug prices—with the negotiated price applying to both Medicare and private insurance and capped at no more than 120% of the average price in six other countries?
Thinking about health care policy, would you support or oppose allowing states to import prescription drugs from other countries?
Thinking about gun regulation, would you support or oppose prohibiting state and local governments from publishing the names and addresses of all gun owners?
Thinking about gun regulation, would you support or oppose banning assault-style rifles?
Thinking about gun regulation, would you support or oppose making it easier for people to obtain a concealed-carry permit?

Thinking about immigration policy, would you support or oppose granting legal status to undocumented immigrants who have held jobs and paid taxes for at least three years and have not been convicted of any felony crimes?
Thinking about immigration policy, would you support or oppose increasing the number of Border Patrol agents on the U.S.–Mexico border?
Thinking about immigration policy, would you support or oppose increasing border security spending by $25 billion, including building a wall along the U.S.–Mexico border?
Thinking about abortion policy, would you support or oppose always allowing a woman to obtain an abortion as a matter of personal choice?
Thinking about abortion policy, would you support or oppose permitting abortion only in cases of rape, incest, or when the woman’s life is in danger?
Thinking about abortion policy, would you support or oppose prohibiting all abortions after the 20th week of pregnancy?
Thinking about abortion policy, would you support or oppose allowing employers to decline coverage of abortion services in their employees’ health insurance plans?
Thinking about abortion policy, would you support or oppose prohibiting the use of federal funds for any abortion?
Thinking about abortion policy, would you support or oppose making abortions illegal in all circumstances?
Thinking about abortion policy, would you support or oppose prohibiting states from requiring that abortions be performed only in hospitals rather than clinics?
Thinking about environmental policy, would you support or oppose giving the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) the authority to regulate carbon dioxide emissions?

Thinking about environmental policy, would you support or oppose requiring each state to generate a minimum share of its electricity from renewable sources (wind, solar, hydroelectric), even if this slightly increases electricity prices?
Thinking about environmental policy, would you support or oppose strengthening the EPA’s enforcement of the Clean Air Act and Clean Water Act, even if it costs some U.S. jobs?

Thinking about environmental policy, would you support or oppose raising the average fuel-efficiency standard for all cars and trucks in the United States from 40 miles per gallon to 54.5 miles per gallon by 2025?
Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose eliminating mandatory minimum sentences for non-violent drug offenders?
Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose requiring police officers to wear body cameras that record all of their activities while on duty?
Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose increasing the number of police on the street by 10 percent, even if it means fewer funds for other public services?
Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose decreasing the number of police on the street by 10 percent and increasing funding for other public services?
Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose banning the use of choke holds by police?
Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose creating a national registry of police officers who have been investigated for or disciplined for misconduct?
Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose ending the Department of Defense program that transfers surplus military weapons and equipment to police departments?

Thinking about policing policy, would you support or oppose allowing individuals or their families to sue a police officer for damages if the officer is found to have recklessly disregarded the individual’s rights?
Would you support or oppose the United States rejoining the Paris Climate Agreement?
Would you support or oppose requiring that all employees at large companies be vaccinated?
Do you intend to vote in the upcoming general election?

options.4: I plan to vote before Election Day
